PowerDistribution.description: This is the schema definition for a power distribution component or unit, such as a floor power distribution unit (PDU) or switchgear.
PowerDistribution.longDescription: This resource shall be used to represent a power distribution component or unit for a Redfish implementation.

title: #PowerDistribution.PowerDistribution
